article_summary: China successfully launched the advanced AIRSAT-05 satellite on August 20, 2025, marking a significant step in on-orbit intelligence. Meanwhile, the World Humanoid Robot Games in Beijing showcased robotics innovation and public interest in the field. Additionally, China's second batch-produced AG600 amphibious aircraft is nearing delivery, and a Chinese scientist has created an ultra-resilient soft robot. These advancements underscore China's focus on technological innovation to propel its industrial future.</s>
